Our system is designed to be easy. We handle the unexpected extremely well so don't worry too much about formatting. These notes are provided for posterity sake.
Dates should be formatted as MM/DD/YYYY or MM/DD/YY
Times should be formatted as HH:MM AM/PM or HH:MM (24 hour)
Lists of things should be separated by commas
URLs and links need to have “http://” or “www.” at the front, or “.com, .org, etc” at the end.
Please provide as much information as possible. Duplicate information will automatically be filtered out.
We do our best to parse nearly every format we can, and it's very rare we encounter things we haven't seen before.
Don't worry. After you upload the template, we'll let you know if there are any possible problem areas before you confirm the upload.
Problem with uploads are extremely rare, and if you encounter any we will work with you one on one until the problem is resolved.
